Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: LBC80
Reviews.Content: 4 probably one even less hotel terrible every single aspect may consider staff front desk slow rude times lift scary least two kinds rooms news renovated ones decent old filthy ones really terrible renovated 1015 years ago breakfast even worth mentioning well maybe yes take free even worth 1 euro lot people sent hotel airlines delays suppose could care less clients good thing 24 hour shuttle airport normally great prices lobby couple offer decent prices quality tapas meals

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, quiet, close to airport”
Reviews.Author: reinadezapatos
Reviews.Content: dont know people perfectly okay hotel used overnight stay heading areas spain despite arriving airport shuttle bus picked us within 20 minutes hotel 10 minutes later two staff language problems cafe still going beer coffee tapas 20 euros two us want room modern clean well maintained showers stuff worked decent toiletries provided balcony wanted use hotel faces onto busy road room looked quiet garden square trees quiet enough breakfast fine worse keep going morning go back airport following morning pick hire car shuttle bus got us back within 20 minutes would happy stay

Reviews.Title: “Avoid this hotel”
Reviews.Author: RoxanaRegue
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night business paid 50 euros good value hotel bit dated overall would stay im madrid need stay near airport plus points couple authentic bars restaurants right next hotel small shop 5 mins walk away metro stop 10 minutes walk away free shuttle airport minus points internet slow 10pm ok morning though

Reviews.Title: “Not good”
Reviews.Author: ChopperBarton
Reviews.Content: staff best hotel last renovated much apart service still working

Reviews.Title: “Nightmare”
Reviews.Author: Paul9876
Reviews.Content: booked hotel needed get connection flight next day madrid awful hotel rooms smelly hot heating could turned due faulty dirty old fashioned staff rooms secure signs doors previous break elevators working restaurant building rip waiting travelers free bus airport need leave early takes get would rather sleep airport stay

Reviews.Title: “Dreadful, Dreadful, Dreadful”
Reviews.Author: Helen987
Reviews.Content: worst airport hotel stayed travel frequently walls paper thin room hotel unusual unpleasant bathroom quite night front desk staff quite surly airport shuttle mad large group unhappy travelers

Reviews.Title: “Average experience”
Reviews.Author: brebers
Reviews.Content: idea hotel got bad review status friend stayed week room huge even dining table paid 300 euros week staff friendly spoke good english always happy help 10 minute walk de metro station end line line 5 take straight centre town 2030 minutes drinks bar quite expensive however shuttle bus airport took pick us promptly took us airport return flight clean nice well dont know reviewers staying hotel seems completely different hotel reviewed right hotel thats thinking

Reviews.Title: “A fraud”
Reviews.Author: mastorna
Reviews.Content: like others put iberia flights delayed madrid depressing place weve spent night waited 2 hours shuttle pick us front desk unfriendly almost grumpy arrived although offered us complimentary lunch checked time lunch closing specifically asked would still allowed eat told yes rushed room really quick put bags away came back turned away euros enough least get bottle water vending machine decided shower rest dinner opened four hours room average nice large bathroom television small work well ventilation system must broken often smelled smoke odd fish smells cafeteria unfortunately location seem convenient enough even venture explore city madrid heading back airport one positive thing shuttle time take us back airport next day close plenty time check make way gate going miss another flight spain

Reviews.Title: “Not again”
Reviews.Author: aetsy
Reviews.Content: booked hotel close madrid airport provided free shuttle service located neighborhood apartments particularly attractive wife traveling would stayed hotel staff friendly limited english internet access available fee 25 euros 24 hours 12 euros one hour air conditioning worked well rooms ate dinner el one hotels restaurants food good staff addition smoking restaurant one couple left finished meal next another couple smoked throughout meal fairly inexpensive hotel get pay

Reviews.Title: “Hardly four stars...”
Reviews.Author: zolagola
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights hotel found appreciate clean large rooms new arranged bathroom operated air condition quiet area even though nearby airport wonderful surrounding green clean quit area close metro station 10 minutes walk friendly staff rich breakfasts

Reviews.Title: “What a mistake...”
Reviews.Author: Mrs Slow Duck
Reviews.Content: put hotel en route london disappointment place looks like updated since none staff knew place long distance phone call hotel london food disgusting ended good thing next day

Reviews.Title: “close to the airport, but that's it!”
Reviews.Author: Lazboh
Reviews.Content: stuck madrid due iberia put us hotel paid accomodation food hotel maybe dream holiday pretty close airport impressed efficiency given spain check straight forward well prepared dinner ok breakfast buffet great need hotel close airport one worth considering although idea whether cheap

Reviews.Title: “Don't know what everybody complains about”
Reviews.Author: Johnacoles
Reviews.Content: weve staying hotel years bit worn spots still cant beat value convenience long arent driving taking taxi since somewhat difficult 24 hour free airport shuttle nearby metro doesnt make sense anyway 2 bars restaurant small shopping center attached hotel neighborhood behind including steakhouse good chinese place pizza couple traditional spanish restaurants also great place dont want breakfast hotel however buffet euros 2 1 melia card good value best addition new de metro station half mile walk much convenient going airport zone 1 1 euro go center madrid youre looking nightlife isnt place euros double room hard beat

Reviews.Title: “Not bad if you just need a place to sleep for a night”
Reviews.Author: adrianal
Reviews.Content: fabulous rooms great pool lots food options close airport free transfer excellent

Reviews.Title: “The Tryp was a trip”
Reviews.Author: summurluv
Reviews.Content: stayed twice spain first night upon arrival madrid liked enough stay last night leaving comfortable clean rooms 5 minutes airport free airport one call upon cents send shuttle get staff spoke english somewhat rude others helpful might difficult find car confusing maze getting airport 5 minute walk metro de minutes puerta del sol metro

Reviews.Title: “Bring your ear plugs!!”
Reviews.Author: morgini
Reviews.Content: hotel nice lobby great towels bathroom staff helpful right requested wake call reserved spot airport shuttle night checked wake call would rate make fact made call asked time flight told said would fine reception staff also spoke little english claim four star business hotel need staff passing english

Reviews.Title: “No way to come back”
Reviews.Author: bonnalex
Reviews.Content: got airport 11pm called hotel shuttle shuttle show hotel answer calls couldnt figure took shuttle 1 12 hours get claimed hotel less 10 minutes away got hotel two people working front desk long line customers took quite get rooms rooms hallways pretty disgusting lobby nice pretty 4 bars couple restaurants least 1 rooms hallways seriously feel dirty view pool filled lovely green water gave impression lived disgusting like room rest hotel stayed one night next day got back airport would recommend longer 1 night stayed better hostels

Reviews.Title: “Avoid at all costs”
Reviews.Author: rwrw
Reviews.Content: early evening arrival asked hotel desk whether place store luggage checking next morning told paid another days stay hotel luggage stay room touring madrid flight wasnt 1130 night waiting hotel bus take airport noticed door across suitcase luggage storage room

Reviews.Title: “One of Worst... to be avoided”
Reviews.Author: Aval
Reviews.Content: convienent us 8 hours flights hotel situated close madrid airport free transfers easy arrange hotel outdated thread bare carpets curtains checked would assumed closed years paid could complain better sleeping seats airport thinking staying make sure 1 night stopover break

Reviews.Title: “A nice short stay”
Reviews.Author: TravellerOmer
Reviews.Content: stranded madrid night missing connecting flight home since airline fault provided accommodation food stay double room modern clean good size bathroom largest 5 hotel rooms europe trip received vouchers meals eaten elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “FAR from everything”
Reviews.Author: mzip
Reviews.Content: rooms tired smelly damp etc food awful expensive mediocre service helped elderly gentleman suitcases whilst hotel staff stood watched struggle

Reviews.Title: “Bad Choice”
Reviews.Author: uskuhlmans
Reviews.Content: tryp diana modern 4 star hotel built fairly large chain rooms plain modern standard double room booked king sized bed channel tv room safe good heater air conditioning controls also balcony although view apartment block opposite really view remember bathroom particularly large well equipped although lack bath shower noticeable bath quite smooth surface restaurant separate cafeteria snack type meals tried cafeteria food fast plain well cooked reasonably priced also 3 bars including one tapas good also number small shops including travel agent found service excellent friendly staff addition free 24 hour shuttle bus airport bonus hotel located residential area 10 minutes airport it’s great location people wanting stopover catching early flight

Reviews.Title: “Avoid”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel last night spain lobby somewhat carpet hallway least 30 years old dirty arrived water coming pipes dinner okay returned rooms water front desk less helpful asked bottled water since soap hands could wash told call room service twin beds plastic box uncomfortable television reception best rooms group included breakfast call breakfast fruit pastries others paid rate shuttle airport okay took 10 minutes terminal 1 far one worst hotels ever going back weeks stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice and convenient stay”
Reviews.Author: RanyDanny
Reviews.Content: came back hotel four night stay read negative reviews wasnt expecting anything special say happy every aspect stay would definately go back rooms spacious spotlessly cleaned every day reception staff couldnt enough help spoke good english good bars reasonably priced pool nice lots area easily supermarket local bars metro short walk takes madrid 1 euro per trip shuttle service airport regular

Reviews.Title: “Bad service, shabby rooms - Stay Away!”
Reviews.Author: pj813
Reviews.Content: stayed due early flight barajas airport provided complimentary airport shuttle paid 56 euros nights stay isnt bad ive seen hotel much higher rate 4 star hotel ive seen better 4 star hotels spain staff friendly enough lobby floor hotel room good spacious massive outside balcony nothing stand news channels tv quite minibar bathroom nice powerful shower didnt want get bar lobby bar diana nice small friendly prices showed tvs bar thing dont like wouldnt change channel asked even though 3 massive tvs said spanish stays bad place easy find foot nice size room close airport free shuttle bus airport important note waiting airport shuttle didnt come til leave people come back lucky got first time happy travels
